PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeWasteTrap
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe fitting, set adjacent to a sanitary terminal, that retains liquid to prevent the passage of foul air.

PropertyDef.Name: WasteTrapType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of trap from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: OutletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the outlet connection from the waste disposal unit.

PropertyDef.Name: InletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition:
Size of the inlet connection(s), where used, of the inlet connections.
Note that all inlet connections are assumed to be the same size.
